Html: Hi, on my priest I like to export the "Relative Stat Values" chart and use it with the "Pawn" addon in-game. I wonder if you could add "Relative Stat Values" to the tree model as well since I miss this feature on my druid?

Yeah, adding the relative stat values would be great (once the haste ratios are fixed).

What I do in the meantime is look at the values of the gems, you can work out the stat values from them.  Just takes a bit of work and a clear mind or a calculator :)
